title: Con Air
actors: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich
plot: Former US Army Ranger, Cameron Poe, has just been paroled for manslaughter, but must stop a group of violent and deadly criminals from escaping the country after they seize control of the prison transport plane he is on.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 7 wins & 11 nominations total
